channel.title: Log in works, but disconnects right when I log in?
channel.description:
Alright, you can log onto my server fine, but why does it not let me play for more then like 5 seconds?
Is there a simple solution to this?
Here's my video on the problem. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tV7nYvq_WLs
The server is up right now, try it yourself.
Thanks in advance![br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 06, 2008, 04:47:03 pm[/size][hr]Anyone know if this is a port problem?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 06, 2008, 05:03:05 pm[/size][hr]Has to be someone who had this problem before... : |

item.title: Log in works, but disconnects right when I log in?
item.dc:creator: @hilariousness16 hilariousness16
item.description:
@hilariousness16 wrote:

Really? why does the localhost work and not the actual IP then?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 07, 2008, 07:03:51 am[/size][hr]Alight, I tried another source and it works -_- I’ll try to see what’s up…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 07, 2008, 07:11:36 am[/size][hr]ALright problem solved, re-downloaded source.

Read full topic

item.title: Log in works, but disconnects right when I log in?
item.dc:creator: @chris_lol chris lol
item.description:
@chris_lol wrote:

its either an invalad starting place, invalad item on login, or invalad object in your surroundings. make a command that teles you to like falador, and when u login do it real fast. youll logout then, then log back in. if it still happens, its an invad item. so go into char files and remove all items off the account, and set all player looks to 1. if it still does it, then switch sources lol.

Read full topic
